A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I hope everyone yells at me for loving this film. Objectively\, this movie doesn't have that many issues. And most of them are very minor. This film has arguably some of the most compelling character arcs and conflict in the entire saga. Yes\, the Finn and Rose stuff in the casino is a bit boring\, but the core narrative surrounding Kylo\, Rey\, And Luke was very compelling. Rian Johnson knows what he's doing.
